DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate clinical outcome patient receive treatment suspect premalignant malignant gastrointestinal lesion Interventional Endoscopy Services . The primary outcome curative endoscopic resection . Secondary outcome include resection technique utilized , rate en bloc resection adverse event rate , include infection , bleeding , perforation death , one-year survival rate .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Outcomes Endoscopic Resection Premalignant Malignant Gastrointestinal Lesions
DOC.criteria: Patients age > 18 year refer endoscopic treatment GI lesion . Patients sign inform consent Patients endoscopic treatment perform .
